body.name: DMI Seat Cushion Donut Pillow and Chair Pillow for Tailbone Pain Relief, Hemorrhoids, Prostate, Pregnancy, Post Natal, Pressure Relief and Surgery, 18 x 15 x 3, Navy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 35 mins
features: DONUT PILLOW is perfect for preventing pressure on the tailbone and lower extremities. The discreet hole in the middle relieves pain and pressure related to sciatica, childbirth, hemorrhoid sufferers or those who sit for extended periods of time
SEAT CUSHION high density foam keeps its original shape even after repeated use and it is great for travel, at home, in the car or at the office
DONUT PILLOW FOR TAILBONE RELIEF features a ring shape that conforms to the lower body contouring and providing natural comfort and support
DONUT CUSHION is machine washable with an easy to remove polyester cotton cover. NOTE: Please allow this product to air out at least 24 hours before use.
TAILBONE PAIN RELIEF CUSHION PRODUCT SPECS: 18 inches long x 13 inches wide x 3 inches high
body.description: This Best-Selling Donut Pillow and Seat Cushion helps reduce pressure on the back or tailbone while sitting for extended periods of time, especially on hard chairs! This cushion can provide welcome relief. The high-density foam retains It's shape even after multiple uses and the removable cover is machine washable. It’s perfect form contours to the lower body and provides pain relief for those suffering from hemorrhoids, prostate issues or for women experiencing pregnancy related pain and discomfort. Size measures 18 x 15 x 3 and weighs only 7 ounces making it perfect to bring along for travel or to the office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My bottom loves this
reviews.reviewText: I used this pillow after giving birth. It is comfy and durable and definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable "donut" pillow out there.
reviews.reviewText: Gives strong support, helps with low back pain especially in car. Relieves tailbone & low back pain while giving support to other areas of your back & butt! Best pillow out there also works great on office chairs and any chair you sit in a lot! I've bought multiple ones for myself & others! I love mine!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not what you are thinking
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I are actively participating in a workout series called Essentrics. The creator of this program recommends this hemorrhoid pillow for floor work to support and cushion the hip while keeping proper form. It has been a game changer in form for me. I am feeling the leg work in a completely different way ow and seeing results even faster. Highly recommend for exercise purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greatest little back support innovation!
reviews.reviewText: This product always delivers. The only negative point is that it is not as firm as it used to be a few years ago, and wears out more quickly (gets too soft for heavier people). Nevertheless, a great product, and it gets to you on time...and sometimes ahead of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO glad to have found this!!!
reviews.reviewText: One of the other reviewers explained that they were using this for an exercise program called "Essentrics". And I'm SO thankful they did because I was looking for this pillow for the very same thing! Used it for the first time today and it made SUCH a difference. Pillow is a good size and just the right amount of firmness/support. Has a really nice, machine washable cover. Required a little effort to get it out and back into the cover "just so", but the benefit was well worth it!!! SO happy I bought this pillow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This does the job of taking pressure off a post-op incision, but as others have noted, it is pretty firm. Encourages me to not sit too long!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent for driving and office chair. Gives your lumbar a good rest and the cushion is pretty sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very soft cushion does not provide any support for the tail bone or hemorrhoids as expected.
reviews.reviewText: When I sat on the cushion it flattened down to less than half an inch which provided the same amount of support as a soft pillow and not the specific amount of support in specific areas that one expects from a product made to alleviate pressure on the tail bone etc... since no matter how you sit on it the support is everywhere just like it would be if you weren't using this cushion at all.Other reviews seem to be complaining about this item being too stiff. I wish that was the case. I would have been happy with that. I assume that they are selling very different cushions under this same listing? So it is hard to know what to expect.I'll add that I am not particularly over weight. I'm about 190 pounds and over 6 feet tall. I can actually squeeze the cushion down to half an inch using just two fingers and not really trying. I expect even a child would have the same difficulty with this product.

Me caí patinando y sufrí una contusión en el hueso sacro, necesitaba un cojín en forma de dona para poder sentarme y de todos este fue el mejor!Totalmente recomendado!Mi trasero y yo lo agradecemos demasiado.
Comfy and well made. Arrived quickly!
Love this cushion for doing pilates/yoga stretches. Would definately purchase again. And price very reasonable

I ordered this because it looked like it has a larger cut out than most other cushions. The cut out is in fact larger relative to the overall cushion size, but the cushion itself is smaller than almost every other one I've gotten.I couldn't sit on this for more than 10 seconds before I got so uncomfortable I couldn't bare it.For something more expensive than most other cushions, it's somehow even worse than them.

The donut turns up bigger than I expected. Most importantly it serve its purpose for me who just had my hemorrhoid surgery. However, the foam feels kind of stiff and will be good if have memory foam version. If comfort level improved, it will be a perfect solution.
